channel.title: Fealtx [2006] Spawn PK || Amazing Old-School Pking
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/fnu3j7.png[/img][/CENTER]
[COLOR=Red]Forums: http://fealtx.info Client Download: http://fealtx.info/index.php?topic=4.0 [/COLOR] [center][COLOR=blue]Fealtx, the revolution of spawn servers (Not really lol)This will be a 317(2006) Spawn server, with Pkpoints and no customs (Meaning only items from 2006). Featuring flawless pking, this is the server to go to if you want to quench your thirst for oldschool pking, while not having to grind on a remake for dayz.[/COLOR] ;)[/center]
[COLOR=green] Features:
*Full clipping *Flawless 2006 pking *Perfect Potions *Perfect shops *Only 317 items, include zerker rings, Fire Cape and Abby whip etc. *Perfect Dharoks *Friendly staff (Forum staff and mods will be needed) *Super Donators get custom yell command *Only Staff and Donators can yell *Pkpoints challenging and rewarding *Pure, Master and setlevel commands
And More!
These are pictures taken by ex-coowner Fallen Ashe. This was before we he was kicked and we changed the name. [/COLOR]
[CENTER][COLOR=RED]Mage (There is ahrims, just didnt wear it)[/COLOR]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603654/Mage.png[/img]
[COLOR=RED]Range[COLOR=RED]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603655/Range.png[/img]
[COLOR=RED]Perfect Dharoks[COLOR=RED]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603663/Dharoks.png[/img]
[COLOR=RED]Full pots + mage and range pots[COLOR=RED]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603665/Pots.png[/img]
[COLOR=BLUE]Other Stuff[/COLOR] This was before we made a yelltag command. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603672/Commands.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603676/PkShop.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603677/Questtab.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603681/Yell_command_Custom.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[size=6pt]Credit: %80 Izumi for Prixus remake base Me: %20 for redoing things to it, adding some combat formulas and leeching Izumi's base :) [/size] In need of Admins, so If your active and nice, you can become an Admin if meeting the requirements.
Thank you for reading :)

item.title: Fealtx [2006] Spawn PK || Amazing Old-School Pking
item.dc:creator: @Fealt Fealt
item.description:
@Fealt wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:458680”]I read it wrong.

Looks good. What’s the base and what’s up with the dolan meme banner?[/quote]
Its Project Insanity Base, and I made the banner, thouight it was cool but maybe its really gay.

lostmyphat:

why is there a penis in the chatbox

My Old co-owner who was a dick, he made these pictures. Will update soon.

Soulcist:

Immature as Hell.

You havent even been on it, yet you call it Immature? Im not immature and Im the only staff atm. I was going for funny with the banner btw.

Read full topic

[CENTER]

[COLOR=Red]Forums: http://fealtx.info
Client Download: http://fealtx.info/index.php?topic=4.0
[/COLOR]
[center][COLOR=blue]Fealtx, the revolution of spawn servers (Not really lol)This will be a 317(2006) Spawn server, with Pkpoints and no customs (Meaning only items from 2006). Featuring flawless pking, this is the server to go to if you want to quench your thirst for oldschool pking, while not having to grind on a remake for dayz.[/COLOR] ;)[/center]

[COLOR=green]
Features:

*Full clipping
*Flawless 2006 pking
*Perfect Potions
*Perfect shops
*Only 317 items, include zerker rings, Fire Cape and Abby whip etc.
*Perfect Dharoks
*Friendly staff (Forum staff and mods will be needed)
*Super Donators get custom yell command
*Only Staff and Donators can yell
*Pkpoints challenging and rewarding
*Pure, Master and setlevel commands

And More!

These are pictures taken by ex-coowner Fallen Ashe. This was before we he was kicked and we changed the name.
[/COLOR]
